sentence.Network_en: Sightseeing is best done either by tour bus or by bicycles.
sentence.Network_cn: 最好是乘坐旅游巴士或骑自行车观光。

sentence.Network_en: Did you have a chance to do any sightseeing ?
sentence.Network_cn: 你有没有出去游览的机会？

sentence.Network_en: The tourists went sightseeing in the suburbs of the city.

encyclopedia.content: 英语释义 语法标注解释 sightseeing英音：['sait,si:iŋ]美音：['saɪt,siɪŋ] 名词n. 1. 观光，游览[U] 形容词adj. 1. 观光的，游览的相关词汇 Sightsee 动词 v. 观光，游览 sightseer 名词 n.观光者，游客例句 Some people like to lie on the beach, but I prefer sightseeing. 有些人喜欢躺在海滩上，而我则宁愿去游览观光。 We will do some sightseeing this weekend. 我们这个周末会去城

entry.def: If you go sightseeing or do some sightseeing, you travel around visiting the interesting places that tourists usually visit.

means.word_mean: 1. going about to look at places of interest

auth_sentence.content: Spend a few days sightseeing in a wheelchair!
auth_sentence.res_content: Spend a few days sightseeing in a wheelchair!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spend a few days sightseeing in a wheelchair!

auth_sentence.content: There are plenty of them, from sightseeing to clubbing.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are plenty of them, from sightseeing to clubbing.

auth_sentence.content: The collection is compulsive, if slightly wayward, sightseeing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The collection is compulsive, if slightly wayward, sightseeing.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 富有洞察力的,有深刻见解的
stems_affixes.word_buile: insight[n.洞察力,见识]+ful有……的→adj.富有洞察力的,有深刻见解的
in进入+sight眼光；观察，看→眼光看进去→洞察力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 勘漏, 失察, 疏忽, 失败, 小心照顾
stems_affixes.word_buile: over在……之上,越过+sight眼光；观察，看→越过[漏洞]→没看到
sight眼光；观察，看→n.视力,视觉,见,视域,眼界
sight视力,视觉+see眼光；观察，看+ing状态→n.观光，游览

sentences.en: Some people like to lie on the beach, but I prefer to go sightseeing.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢在海滩上躺着, 但我喜欢去游览。

sentences.en: Most of our time was spent in sightseeing.
sentences.cn: 我们的大部分时间用在游览上。
